document.full_text: iran will hold talks with major powers in turkey over its disputed nuclear program, president mahmoud ahmadinejad said on monday, after earlier discussions failed to resolve the row.
document.title: iran to attend nuclear talks in turkey: president
lines_and_colors: iran will hold talks with major powers in turkey over its disputed nuclear program, president mahmoud ahmadinejad said on monday, after earlier discussions failed to resolve the row.
